entity.name: ECT TEST - White House instructs staff to wear masks after two test positive

text:
@WhiteHouse Once again you are ridiculous.  Why don't you visit nursing homes and hospitals where covid19 is so bad.  Oh and don't wear your mask, please.  
Grow up.  You will never be the President Obama was,. Not even the President George W Bush was.  He was more popular than you. 😂
